O9LYIfMmB3PGZ6FGKY5IgQ.text: Back for another quick dinner pre-cinema. I let our waitress know that we only had a 40 minutes before our movie, she was quick double time and order done, drinks arrived, salad bar done and tasty pizza munched and a happy lindsay go to the pictures with time to spare!   Really pleased that you can now get a small stuffed crust pizza.   I have upped my star rating to 4. Reliable Pizza Hut, you have got to love it.

afhdRQfJ9A4Yl4zr3klmTQ.text: You don't come to Pizza Hut for fine dining so I don't feel the need to post an essay length review of what it's like when you come here.  The pizza is the same in all the branches, so is the fact you get free refills on juice so long as you're eating and haven't paid your bill.  This particular branch can be hit and miss with the service. On my most recent visit here, one of the members of staff whose name I never managed to see, seemed to throw anything at me and my fiancee any time we asked for anything, not the best service in the world.  Good for a cheap night out if you fancy some pizza though.

3-A8FpmkRZqBvJsRx5egQA.text: The hot cookie served with ice cream is so delicious!! The price is quite expensive but it is so nice and it is a dessert to share. You don t need to be hungry to eat it.

photos.caption: Photo of Pizza Hut - Edinburgh, United Kingdom
Photo of Pizza Hut - Edinburgh, United Kingdom

GCObNxRBr9ZThXLIVnnrmQ.text: Great pizza restaurant in the cinema complex in Fountainpark. It is quite spacious and offers a very warm interior. Staff are friendly but sometimes could be a bit slow. There is a good choice of pizza toppings and drinks. Menu is similar to all other branches of the chain. You could also order the famous hot cookie with ice-cream topping, some say they are ready to kill for it. Really pleasant for relaxation, catch up with friends or any kind of family gatherings.

photos.caption: Photo of Pizza Hut - Edinburgh, United Kingdom

Aj6Lgq5Z2jcVhJPN3a3Nsg.text: Probably the best Pizza Hut in the city. This place has a very laid-back atmosphere and is perfect for a pre- or post- cinema meal. The staff are friendly, if sometimes a little confused, and the food arrives promptly to your table.   I've been really pleased every time I've eaten here, even though I've asked for some slightly strange things on occasion (please leave off the raspberry sauce on the cheesecake being one of them). I've always left a generous tip because the service has deserved it. Only once did anyone get mixed up with my order, but once I managed to get them to see what had happened it was fixed right away.

Y4wVjl46QQQyaKZf6H72Ww.text: I like pizza hut as a whole however I tend 2 find the service in this one a bit low standard. been in a few times now and it always seems 2 take a good 5minutes before were acknowledged. other than that good :)

4yO1AO68JC51o1raG01pjg.text: Good pizza with a good selection on the menu.This place is a good place to go with kids if they like pizza.There are a lot of diffrent toppings you can choose from.The staff are kind and approachable.

MC2YTf3aIUrQOfxN8TB93A.text: Dirtiest restaurant I have ever been in, ever. We went in after seeing a film, and we didn't even sit down! Walked straight back out.
